Violence again in Himmatnagar of Gujarat, 4 people were arrested
.
Officials in Sabarkantha district of Gujarat told news agency PTI that violence sparked after stone pelting started between two separate communities. In some videos shared on social media, many people are seen throwing petrol bombs.
According to SP Vishalkumar Vaghela, it was a small clash. He said, "We arrived on the spot as soon as we were informed about the clash. Case was small and we overcome the situation shortly. "Earlier, violence had spread due to stone pelting during Ram Navami's Shobha Yatra in Himmatnagar on Sunday. DM had imposed Section 144 of CRPC to control the situation.

Subhash Shankar, close to Nirav Modi, was extorted from Egypt and brought to India
.
Under a big campaign, Central Investigation Agency CBI, fugitive diamond businessman Nirav Modi's special ally Subhash Shankar Parab has been extraded to India. Subhash Shankar is among the main accused in Nirav Modi's 7 thousand crore bank fraud case. Parab was the Deputy General Manager (Finance) at Firestar Diamond Company, the news agency PTI cited officials.

More than 10,000 civilians were killed in the city, Mariupol's mayor said
.
At least 10,000 people have been killed since the beginning of the war in the city, the Ukraine's Mariupol mayor told news agency Associated Press. "The roads are filled with corpses, Mayor Vedim Boyshenko said on Monday. "
The Mayor was talking to some unknown place in Ukraine. He said there are still 1 million 20 thousand people trapped in Mariupol. These people urgently need food, water and medicines.
Boyshenko said he also had a report that Russian soldiers are collecting bodies and keeping them in the fridge at large shopping centres. He said, "Trucks as mobile funerals are rolling. You will unlock it and there is a pipe in it that is burning these bodies. "

"Numerous vicious altercations have taken place during Ram Navami between Hindus and Muslims.

And in almost every case, the Modus Operandi remains the same.

- A procession for celebrating Ram Navami is taken through a heavily Muslim populated area.

- Provocative slogans and songs are played against the Muslims usually outside a mosque.

- A stone pelting incident is reported by "unidentified people"

- Mobs start attacking and vandalizing the shops and houses of the Muslims in this area with weapons and torches.

- Police watch as mute spectators

Here are a few questions:

- How are these processions allowed to be taken out without any sort of Police permission? And even if there is a permission given, why was it given when there was an obvious attempt to raise ruckus?

- Why were the processions taken out specifically in Muslim areas?

- Why were the Police doing nothing when provocative songs and slogans are played over loudspeakers? Are they deaf? They couldn't hear the slogans?

- Who pelted the stones? Have they been identified?

- How were the Ram Navami procession people armed and ready to burn and attack? Were they already carrying weapons and torches? The police couldn't see it?

Whether it was Gujarat or MP or Karnataka or Maharashtra or West Bengal, the Modus Operandi was absolutely the same.

It is impossible to not believe that these attacks were not pre-scripted.

The identical MO clearly sets a prima facie case for this being an organized attempt at vitiating the atmosphere, deliberately on a day which is auspicious to all communities.

It is clear who is organizing this, mitron."

Pakistani stock market rises after Imran Khan's government falls
.
Pakistan Stock Exchange is seeing a stance on the first day of business after the success of no confidence motion against former Prime Minister Imran Khan in Pakistan. KSE (Karachi Stock Exchange) 100 Index jumped over 1400 points so far and has seen a trend of buying by investors.
According to stock market brokers, the latest events in the political situation in the country have taken a positive turn in the stock market. Meanwhile, the rupee is also getting stronger than the dollar and the dollar has fallen by Rs 1.83 at the start of the business.
